statements: DELETE FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE driver_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM vehicle_tracking WHERE gps_latitude < 40.0 AND gps_longitude > -75.0;
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 98765 AND last_update_timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM routes WHERE driver_name = 'John Doe' AND start_location = 'Los Angeles';
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 101 AND driver_id = 201;
DELETE FROM drivers WHERE driver_name = 'John Doe' AND driver_status = 'Active';
DELETE FROM gps_data WHERE speed < 60 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM drivers WHERE license_number LIKE 'ABC%';
